epics.name: Loan Application Portal
epics.description: As a customer, I want to apply for a personal or home loan via an online portal.

userStories.name: Submit Loan Application
userStories.description: Customers can fill out and submit a new loan application.

tasks.name: Render application form
tasks.description: Display a form with personal info, loan details, and document upload.

tasks.name: Form validation and error handling
tasks.description: Show required field errors and disable submission until all errors are resolved.

tasks.name: Show confirmation message after successful submission
tasks.description: Display summary data on successful loan application submission.

userStories.name: Track Application Status
userStories.description: Customers can view their loan application's progress and required actions.

tasks.name: Show status tracker
tasks.description: Display progress steps: Info Provided → Docs Verified → Credit Score → Approved/Rejected.

tasks.name: Show pending actions
tasks.description: If customer needs to upload or correct documents, show the required action.

userStories.name: OCR Scanning Integration
userStories.description: Application system automatically extracts data from uploaded ID/income docs.

tasks.name: Trigger fake OCR API call on document upload
tasks.description: Simulate an async OCR process and show extracted text on success.

epics.name: Credit Bureau Integration
epics.description: Integrate real-time credit check for submitted applications.

userStories.name: Request Credit Score
userStories.description: System queries credit bureau API using customer info after doc verification.

tasks.name: Simulate credit check API
tasks.description: Async call: Random credit score and pass/fail, shown to the user.

epics.name: Notifications and Reminders
epics.description: Automated email and SMS system for application status and reminders.

userStories.name: Send Application Notifications
userStories.description: Customers receive notifications on status updates or missing documents.

tasks.name: Show notification UI
tasks.description: Show a banner or toast for demo purposes.

tasks.name: Trigger notification on status change
tasks.description: Send a notification when application state changes.

epics.name: Analytics & Reporting
epics.description: Loan team can view loan app metrics: volume, processing speed, auto/manual rates, CSAT.

userStories.name: Loan Dashboard
userStories.description: Employees see loans stats (progress, SLA, outcomes, automation rate, CSAT).

tasks.name: Display analytics dashboard
tasks.description: Show charts: # submitted, # approved, # auto/manual, avg. time, CSAT, pie/bar breakdown.
